amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to add language that recognizes the ongoing epidemic of violence against transgender and gender non-conforming people.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Rouda.
